SEARCH
Package controller.camp

Class CampManager

Object
CampManager
public class CampManager extends Object
This class provides functionality to manage camps in the NTU CAMS System It includes methods for adding and removing suggestions, printing camp details, checking if camp is created by a specific staff, and printing camp information for both staff and students
Since:
25/11/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

    • addSuggestion

      public static void addSuggestion(Camp tempCamp, Suggestion tempSuggestion)
      Adds a suggestion to the list of suggestions for a given camp
      Parameters:
      tempCamp - - The camp to which the suggestion is added
      tempSuggestion - - The suggestion to be added

    • removeSuggestion

      public static void removeSuggestion(Camp tempCamp, Suggestion tempSuggestion)
      Removes a suggestion from the list of suggestions for a given camp
      Parameters:
      tempCamp - - The camp from which the suggestion is removed
      tempSuggestion - - The suggestion to be removed

    • printCampDetails

      public static void printCampDetails(CampDetails detail)
      Prints detailed information about a camp, including its staff in charge
      Parameters:
      detail - - The CampDetails object containing information about the camp

    • printCampDetailsForStudents

      public static void printCampDetailsForStudents(CampDetails detail)
      Prints camp details for students, excluding information about the staff in charge
      Parameters:
      detail - - The CampDetails object containing information about the camp

    • printCampRegistrationForStudents

      public static void printCampRegistrationForStudents(CampDetails detail)
      Prints camp details for students, showing only the camp name
      Parameters:
      detail - - the CampDetails object containing information about the camp

    • isCampCreatedByStaff

      public static boolean isCampCreatedByStaff(String campName, String staffID)
      Checks if specific staff created a given camp
      Parameters:
      campName - - The name of the camp to check
      staffID - - The ID of the staff to compare
      Returns:
      - True if the staff created the camp, false otherwise
